title: Champion Cost
body: Been playing for 3 years now and no champions in the higher IP/RPare getting any cheaper. One would assume that they would eventually get cheaper as you guys keep introducing new champs. Keeping the costs so high is unfair.

replies.body: Hey thanks for the reply hey was helpful. Maybe I was a little impatient and was misreading it all as I usually click price-IP which will start champs from 6300IP and always saw the newer champs there and figured everyone was staying where they were my bad :P

This

They are very slowly getting reduced, it's just hard to tell because it's just one or two.
Riven Xearath etc have all gone down a tier in the last two years... When I started playing they were both 6300s
Ahri and voli both went down last year
